## Remarks
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](../Topic/Using%20Libraries%20from%20Partially%20Trusted%20Code.md).

Docs.summary: Moves to the next element in the enumeration.
Docs.returns: if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next method; if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

Docs.summary: Gets the current object in the collection.

Docs.exception: The collection was modified after the enumerator was created.
